this_title: Red vs. Blue: The Blood Gulch Chronicles Season 4
trans_title: 红蓝大作战 第四季
introduction: The fourth season of of the action-comedy series Red vs. Blue and part of the The Blood Gulch Chronicles. A bomb with a bad attitude, an alien with an epic score to settle, and the usual gang of hapless soldiers are on a quest to save the universe from an ancient prophecy of destruction. The situation doesn't look too good...
chinese_title: 红蓝大作战 第四季
foreign_title: Red vs. Blue: The Blood Gulch Chronicles Season 4
